verses.verse: Would to God <WG3785> that you would bear <WG430> with me <WG3450> a little <WG3397> in <WG877> my foolishness <WG877>: but <WG235> you indeed <WG2532> bear <WG430> with me <WG3450>.

For <WG1063> I am jealous <WG2206> over you <WG5209> with godly <WG2316> jealousy <WG2205>: for <WG1063> I have engaged <WG718> you <WG5209> to one <WG1520> husband <WG435>, that I may present <WG3936> you as a chaste <WG53> virgin <WG3933> to Christ <WG5547>.

But <WG1161> I fear <WG5399>, lest by any means <WG3381>, as <WG5613> the serpent <WG3789> deceived <WG1818> Eve <WG2096> through <WG1722> his <WG846> craftiness <WG3834>, so <WG3779> your <WG5216> minds <WG3540> should be corrupted <WG5351> from <WG575> the simplicity <WG572> that is <WG3588> in <WG1519> Christ <WG5547>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> <WG99999> he <WG3588> that comes <WG2064> preaches <WG2784> another <WG243> Jesus <WG2424>, whom <WG3739> we have <WG2784> not <WG3756> preached <WG2784>, or <WG2228> if you receive <WG2983> another <WG2087> spirit <WG4151>, which <WG3739> you had not <WG3756> received <WG2983>, or <WG2228> another <WG2087> gospel <WG2098>, which <WG3739> you have <WG1209> not <WG3756> accepted <WG1209>, you might <WG430> well <WG2573> bear with him <WG430>.
For <WG1063> I suppose <WG3049> I was <WG5302> not <WG3367> at all behind <WG5302> the very <WG5228> greatest <WG3029> apostles <WG652>.

But <WG1161> though <WG1499> I am rude <WG2399> in speech <WG3056>, yet <WG235> not <WG3756> in knowledge <WG1108>; but <WG235> we have been throughly <WG1722> <WG99999> made manifest <WG5319> among <WG1519> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956>.

Have <WG2228> I committed <WG4160> an offense <WG266> in abasing <WG5013> myself <WG1683> that <WG2443> you <WG5210> might be exalted <WG5312>, because <WG3754> I have preached <WG2097> to you <WG5213> the gospel <WG2098> of God <WG2316> freely <WG1432>?
I robbed <WG4813> other <WG243> churches <WG1577>, taking <WG2983> wages <WG3800> of them <WG4314>, to do you <WG5216> service <WG1248>.

And <WG2532> when I was present <WG3918> with <WG4314> you <WG5209>, and <WG2532> in need <WG5302>, I was a burden to <WG2655> no <WG3756> man <WG3762>: for <WG1063> that which was lacking <WG5303> to me <WG3450> the brothers <WG80> which came <WG2064> from <WG575> Macedonia <WG3109> supplied <WG4322>: and <WG2532> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> things I have kept <WG5083> myself <WG1683> from being burdensome <WG4> unto you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> so will I keep myself <WG5083>.

As <WG3754> the truth <WG225> of Christ <WG5547> is <WG2076> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>, no man <WG3756> shall stop <WG4972> me <WG1691> of this <WG3778> boasting <WG2746> in <WG1722> the regions <WG2824> of Achaia <WG1519>.
Why <WG5101>? Because <WG3754> I don <WG3756>'t love <WG25> you <WG5209>? God <WG2316> knows <WG1492>.

But <WG1161> what <WG3739> I do <WG2532>, that I will do <WG4160>, that <WG2443> I may cut off <WG1581> occasion <WG874> from them <WG3588> which desire <WG2309> occasion <WG874>; that <WG2443> <WG99999> where <WG3739> they boast <WG2744>, they may be found <WG2147> even <WG2532> as <WG2531> we <WG2249>.
For <WG1063> such <WG5108> are false apostles <WG5570>, deceitful <WG1386> workers <WG2040>, transforming themselves <WG3345> into <WG1519> the apostles <WG652> of Christ <WG5547>.
And <WG2532> no <WG3756> marvel <WG2298>; for <WG1063> Satan <WG4567> himself <WG846> is transformed <WG3345> into <WG1519> an angel <WG32> of light <WG5457>.

Therefore <WG3767> it is no <WG3756> great thing <WG3173> if <WG1487> his <WG846> ministers <WG1249> also <WG2532> be transformed <WG3345> as <WG5613> the ministers <WG1249> of righteousness <WG1343>; whose <WG3739> end <WG5056> shall be <WG2071> according to <WG2596> their <WG846> works <WG2041>.

I say <WG3004> again <WG3825>, Let <WG1380> no <WG3361> man <WG5100> think <WG1380> me <WG3165> <WG99999> a fool <WG878>; if <WG1487> otherwise <WG3361>, yet <WG2579> as <WG5613> a fool <WG878> receive <WG1209> me <WG3165>, that <WG2443> <WG99999> I may boast <WG2744> a little <WG5100>.

That which <WG3739> I speak <WG2980>, I speak <WG2980> it not <WG3756> after <WG2596> the Lord <WG2962>, but <WG235> as it were <WG5613> <WG99999> foolishly <WG877>, in <WG1722> this <WG3778> confidence <WG5287> of boasting <WG2746>.
Seeing that <WG1893> many <WG4183> glory <WG2744> after <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561>, I <WG2504> will glory <WG2744> also <WG2504>.
For <WG1063> you suffer <WG430> fools <WG878> gladly <WG2234>, seeing you <WG5607> yourselves are wise <WG5429>.

For <WG1063> you endure <WG430>, if <WG1487> a man <WG5100> brings <WG2615> you <WG5209> into bondage <WG2615>, if <WG1487> a man <WG5100> devours <WG2719> you <WG1487>, if a man <WG5100> takes <WG2983> of you <WG1487>, if a man <WG5100> exalts himself <WG1869>, if <WG1487> a man <WG5100> strikes <WG1194> you <WG5209> on <WG1519> the face <WG4383>.

I speak <WG3004> as according <WG2596> to your shame <WG819>, as <WG5613> though <WG3754> we <WG2249> had been weak <WG770>. But <WG1161> <WG99999> whereinsoever <WG3739> <WG99999> any <WG5100> is bold <WG5111>, (I speak <WG3004> <WG99999> foolishly <WG877>,) I <WG2504> am bold <WG5111> also <WG2504>.

Are they <WG1526> Hebrews <WG1445>? So <WG2504> am I <WG2504>. Are they <WG1526> Israelites <WG2475>? So <WG2504> am I <WG2504>. Are they <WG1526> the seed <WG4690> of Abraham <WG11>? So <WG2504> am I <WG2504>.

Are they <WG1526> ministers <WG1249> of Christ <WG5547>? (I speak <WG2980> as a fool <WG3912>) I <WG1473> am more <WG5228>; in <WG1722> labors <WG2873> more abundant <WG4056>, in <WG1722> stripes <WG4127> above measure <WG5234>, in <WG1722> prisons <WG5438> more frequent <WG4056>, in <WG1722> deaths <WG2288> often <WG4178>.
Of <WG5259> the Jews <WG2453> five times <WG3999> received I <WG2983> forty <WG5062> stripes minus <WG3844> one <WG1520>.

Thrice <WG5151> was I beaten with rods <WG4463>, once <WG530> was I stoned <WG3034>, thrice <WG5151> I suffered shipwreck <WG3489>, a night and a day <WG3574> I have been <WG4160> in <WG1722> the deep <WG1037>;

In journeyings <WG3597> often <WG4178>, in perils <WG2794> of waters <WG4215>, in perils <WG2794> of robbers <WG3027>, in perils <WG2794> by <WG1537> my own countrymen <WG1085>, in perils <WG2794> by <WG1537> the heathen <WG1484>, in perils <WG2794> in <WG1722> the city <WG4172>, in perils <WG2794> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2047>, in perils <WG2794> in <WG1722> the sea <WG2281>, in perils <WG2794> among <WG1722> false brothers <WG5569>;

In <WG1722> weariness <WG2873> and <WG2532> painfulness <WG3449>, in <WG1722> watchings <WG70> often <WG4178>, in <WG1722> hunger <WG3042> and <WG2532> thirst <WG1373>, in <WG1722> fastings <WG3521> often <WG4178>, in <WG1722> cold <WG5592> and <WG2532> nakedness <WG1132>.
Beside <WG5565> those things that are outside <WG3924>, that which comes <WG1999> upon me <WG3450> <WG99999> daily <WG2250>, the care <WG3308> of all <WG3956> the churches <WG1577>.
Who <WG5101> is weak <WG770>, and <WG2532> I am <WG770> not <WG3756> weak <WG770>? Who <WG5101> is offended <WG4624>, and <WG2532> I <WG1473> burn <WG4448> not <WG3756>?
If <WG1487> I must needs <WG1163> glory <WG2744>, I will glory <WG2744> of the things <WG3588> which concern my <WG3450> infirmities <WG769>.

The God <WG2316> and <WG2532> Father <WG3962> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, which is <WG5607> blessed <WG2128> for <WG1519> evermore <WG165>, knows <WG1492> that <WG3754> I lie <WG5574> not <WG3756>.

In <WG1722> Damascus <WG1154> the governor <WG1481> under Aretas <WG702> the king <WG935> guarded <WG5432> the city <WG4172> of the Damascenes <WG1153> with a garrison <WG5432>, desirous <WG2309> to apprehend <WG4084> me <WG3165>:
And <WG2532> through <WG1223> a window <WG2376> in <WG1722> a basket <WG4553> was I let down <WG5465> by <WG1223> the wall <WG5038>, and <WG2532> escaped <WG1628> his <WG846> hands <WG5495>.
